text: Site in 2011 Broadway Ferry was a ferry landing in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City, United States at the foot of Broadway. Boats connected it to the Grand Street Ferry, East 23rd Street Ferry, and James Slip landings in Manhattan. In Brooklyn, the Broadway El ended at the ferry.Cudahy, B.J.(1990). Over and back: The history of ferryboats in New York harbor. New York: Fordham University Press ==See also== *List of ferries across the East River *NY Waterway ==References== Category:Transportation buildings and structures in Brooklyn Category:East River Category:Ferries of New York City
title: Broadway Ferry
